name: Juju - play, chat, win
description:
Juju is the best place to play games, meet new people, and earn rewards!

PLAY
Choose between 4 super fun multiplayer games and battle it out against your opponent! Or compete against yourself with our single player games. The games on Juju range from trivia, to classics, to new games you’ll love.

TALK
Turn on your microphone and use voice chat while you play to meet the person you’re playing against! Playing games is way better when you can talk to your opponent. You may even meet your new best friend.

WIN
Earn gems when you win a game! The more gems you earn, the higher on the leaderboard you will be.

Download Juju to start playing, talking, and earning gems!
